name: Castles
description: Real-time battles in a turn-based strategyThe ability to design your own fortress
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 7 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
